backend/main.mo: Defines core backend types and state for menu items, orders, bookings, user profiles, and Stripe config with access control and status helpers.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to modified files, components, and related test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions for many frontend files used in the project, covering pages, hooks, components, and cart logic.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme variables and dark mode tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/README.md: Frontend documentation describing features, tech stack, and setup instructions, noting Razorpay as the payment provider.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app router and layout setup with auth‑gated routes and CartProvider wrapping the application.
frontend/src/cart/CartProvider.tsx: Cart context managing items with BigInt‑safe persistence, add/remove/update actions, and derived totals.
frontend/src/cart/cartStorage.ts: Serializes and deserializes cart data, converting BigInt fields to/from strings for localStorage.
frontend/src/components/admin/DevResetSe: Empty placeholder file for a developer reset section component.
frontend/src/components/admin/KpiCard.ts: Reusable KPI card displaying a metric title, value, icon, and optional description.
frontend/src/components/admin/RequireAdm: Checks admin status and either renders children or an access denied message.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Displays a login/logout button with Internet Identity handling and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Shows a forced profile setup dialog for new authenticated users and saves profile data.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Requires authentication, storing intended route and prompting login if unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/bookings/Booking: Renders a badge showing booking status based on variant fields.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Displays site footer with links, social icons, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/Navbar.ts: Navigation bar with dynamic links, login button, cart badge, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/menu/MenuItemCar: Card showing menu item details, availability, price, and an add‑to‑cart button.
frontend/src/components/menu/MenuSkeleto: Skeleton grid placeholder for loading menu items.
frontend/src/components/orders/OrderStat: Renders a badge representing order status from multiple possible variants.
frontend/src/components/payments/Payment: Dialog for configuring payment provider settings using Stripe configuration hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/mutations/useBookingA: Provides a mutation to update a booking's status, invalidating related queries and showing toasts.
frontend/src/hooks/mutations/useMenuAdmi: Defines mutations to add, update, and delete menu items while invalidating menu-related queries and displaying toasts.
frontend/src/hooks/mutations/useOrderAdm: Provides a mutation to update order status and refresh related queries with success and error toasts.
frontend/src/hooks/payments/useCreateChe: Creates a Stripe checkout session via actor call and returns session info including URL.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages the backend actor based on identity, refetching dependent queries when actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthRedirect.ts: Manages storing, retrieving, and redirecting to the intended route after authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, managing login, identity loading, and state handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides various queries and mutations for user profiles, admin checks, menu data, orders, bookings, and dashboard metrics.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables and styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Renders the admin dashboard with KPI metrics and lists of orders/bookings, allowing status updates via mutation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/admin/MenuAdminPage.t: Provides a UI for admins to view, create, edit, and delete menu items using dialog forms and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/BookChefPage.tsx: Page for submitting a chef booking request with form validation, actor call, and navigation on success.
frontend/src/pages/BookingsPage.tsx: Displays the user's chef bookings, handling loading, empty states, and rendering sorted booking cards.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Manages the shopping cart UI and checkout flow, including order creation and redirecting to a payment session.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with a hero section and feature cards promoting menu browsing and chef booking.
frontend/src/pages/MenuPage.tsx: Fetches and displays menu items by category with loading/error states and supports adding items to the cart.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersPage.tsx: Shows the user's past orders, handling loading, empty states, and listing detailed order information.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Informs the user that payment failed and provides navigation options back to the cart or menu.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Processes Stripe session results, updates the order payment reference, and confirms successful payment to the user.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling custom colors, typography, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current architecture, features, issues, and state metadata for build planning.
